Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.29859288] Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=25 ± 0 μg/mL);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=16.6 ± 7.2 μM);Fungi:Candida albicans ATCC 90028 (MIC=166.6 ± 57.7 μg/mL)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.29859288] Hemolysis 12.0 ± 0.7% at 500 μg/ml against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Structure Description: The peptide adopts a conformational structure with 80 % alpha helix.
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria. Antifungal activity.

Literature.Title: Expression in Escherichia coli of novel recombinant hybrid antimicrobial peptide AL32-P113 with enhanced antimicrobial activity in vitro.
Literature.Author: Wanmakok M, Orrapin S, Intorasoot A, Intorasoot S.
